1.title: The Beginning

choices: Take pictures of you in baby clothes.
Take you to show-and-tell as her baby.
Put a dog collar on you and take you for a walk.
Put you in a stroller for a walk to your school.
13.content:
"Hey there baby!" Your sister coos in her most adorable baby voice to you. " Do you want some num-nums?"

You roll your eyes, "Cut it out Shanon. I'm not a baby."

Shannon's expression was that of 'oh no he didn't' as she leaned to the side raising her hand. You froze immediately. You instinctively knew what she was about to do. You chided yourself for being so dumb to open your mouth.

*SNAP*

Soon as you heard that all-too-familiar sound you felt your whole body tingle. The same prickly feeling one gets after sitting on their foot too long. The thousand endless pricks one would describe only all over your body. As you were watching the world around you grow taller and taller you shrunk right out of your clothes. By the time the needly sensation ended you were crawling out from under your now tent-like shirt.

"Aww. Pick-A-Boo baby! Pick-A-Boo!" Your little sister played with you.

When you looked up she was squatting over you. Her ecstatic grin betrayed her devious intentions. You knew by the look in her brown eyes she intended to make you do some really embarrassing things.
13.title: Big Little Sister

14.title: Living Room (your decision who is there)

141.content: You go down the stairs directly to the living room, it looks like your mother is not home, and your sister must be still sleeping, so you go to the living room to see a bit of tv before any of your sisters want to shrink you. Sadly when you enter the room you see the tv is on. Somewone is up too early. "Good morning" a voice calls from behind the couch"mind doing your sister a favor?" you still not talk "Mom is out, and our dear sister also is, so I have to babysit you" you start approaching "what do you need?" you ask to shannon...
141.title: Little sister babysitter

Maybe one of the sisters gets shrunk. Sound fun?
142.title: fewfes

15.title: other

152.content:
you suddenly feel a weird sensation you had felt before, you where shrinking, again. You are covered by a gigantic shadow, but before you can turn to see who it was you are pushed to the ground by a giant mass of flesh. You recognize a familiar smell. It was the smell of feet, but whose? You try to recognize it, it smelled like they where clean, so the smell was not so bad, and it did not sweat at all. This can only be the feet of your sister Michelle!
You get your face out of the pressure of her foot and scream.
-Michelle! Let me go!- she seems to hear you but ignores you and starts pushing harder, you are the same size her foot, so you don't get hurt so bad -Michelle! Lift your foot!- you yell at her
Michelle looks at you in disgust -if you say- your sister starts elevating her foot, but, to your disgrace you lift with it -ups, looks like you're stuck, that means you will be with me all day- she starts to walk with you at her feet, she is going...
152.title: Familiar Smell

info.brief_description: your family members have the powers to change your size any time.
info.description:
Your name is Dan, you are 17 years old and 5 foot and 10 inches tall. You have brown hair and blue eyes.

Your mothers name is Sarah, she is 38 years old and has blonde hair and blue eyes. Incase of her age, she is vey hot and she work as secretary. She is 5 foo and 5 inches tall.

You have to sistsers:
Michelle is 16 years old and have red hairs. She loves it to dominate people wh are smaller then her. She is 5 foot and 2 inches tall.

Your other sister is Shannon. She is 12 years old and is 4 foot and 10 inches tall. She has brown hair and blue eyes.

You all live in a house with 7 rooms together. All of your family members have the power to shrink you when ever they want. They can force them do do things for her and you must worship then. They also had the power to grow you, but only to your old size (5 foot 10 inches)

No GIANTS..... JUST GIANTESS

all things are allowed.... HAVE FUN :D
